promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic rare fox steel-type pokemon wearing ornate bracers. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or fox. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Titanix, a a gigantic rare fox steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Tailspin Piledriver. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "fox", "steel" or "Titanix". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, fox-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Rare and colossal, this metal-furred creature reigns over mountain realms. Using Tailspin Piledriver, it shapes the landscape effortlessly.
